      • changeTurn

        public int changeTurn(KillShotTrack killShotTrack,
                      CurrentTurn currentTurn,
                      java.util.List<Player> players,
                      Player currentPlayer)
        method used when turn changes in final frenzy It calculates points for dead players and set their new frenzy board for points it updates also the killshottrack, but not giving any skull to any player
        Specified by:
        changeTurn in class GameMode
        Parameters:
        killShotTrack - the killshottrack to update
        currentTurn - the currentTurn of the game
        players - the list of all the players in the game
        currentPlayer - the current player in the turn
        Returns:
        1 if final frenzy is over, 0 otherwise
